txt.en: 'Come sit with us for a moment, [placeholder].  Your training can wait.'
'Saved?  Well then, untie me!  I am Mundo Sackville-Baggins!  People will hear of this!'
'Wait, where are you going?  [placeholder], what did you do?'
'And don't come back!'

'I am sorry to keep you waiting, [placeholder].  We had much to discuss. We are a little worried about sending anyone outside the Shire.  The bounders are reporting a lot of trouble on our borders so we are not surprised about your friend's troubles in Archet. \n\n'Come walk with me and we can discuss getting you ready for travelling.  The roads out there are not as peaceful as they once were.  The first thing we will need to do is get you armed.'
We're going to a crate!

'We have been having problems with some mysterious critters nibbling at our libraries here.  We should probably clean up these books on the floor but first it will be good practice if you fight back these squirrels! When the squirrels enter, whack them with your new weapon and get them away from those books!'

<rgb=#00FF00>To equip your weapon, open your bags located in the bottom right part of the screen.  You will see your new weapon in your inventory.  

Open your character journal by pressing the letter C on the keyboard or whatever button you remapped your Character Journal to be.  

You can then either double click or drag the weapon to put it into the appropriate equipment slot.</rgb>

'I'm sorry, I was so hasty in trying to get the door open that my key broke! Now our only hope for safety is to try to brave the Stock Road on into Woodhall.\n\n'Follow me closely friend, who knows what else we may run into tonight!'

'So you think just because you shooed some squirrels away you are ready to face the horrors that I have seen outside our beloved Shire?\n\n'Well let's have a go then and let me just how well you can handle yourself.'
'Come now, this way.'
'My satchel is here. Search it quickly!'
'This key shouldn't break....'
'Gracious me, is it safe?'
'Hmm, this door is already open....'
'Be quick now! That rider may come back!'
'Don't stray too far away now!'
'Now, where are those keys?'
'Hold a moment, what's this?  Hobbits?'
'Careful now, maybe we can listen in....'
'That's got it!'
'Depart, foul wraith! You have no power here!'

'Your training will have to be enough now. Take the weapons in the satchel.  They aren't much but hopefully they will help you if you come across any danger.'\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>To open the crate, use your mouse and left click on the crate twice or right-click on the crate once.</rgb>
'Well said, my friend!'
'Don't just stand there, go clear the way ahead to the next gate. I'll keep a watch for that Rider to make sure he doesn't return! I told you the spiders grow big around here.'
'Come now, there is nothing to fear.'
'Help us!  She will be back at any moment.  She is sleeping!'
'You are most welcome, Bounder Boffin!'
'If you still wish to travel to Archet, then speak with Amdir. He is travelling there as well, and I am sure would not turn away the company of a doughty hobbit such as yourself!'
'We had heard tell of Black Riders in the Shire, and so we came in search of them.'

'Take the weapons in the crate.  They aren't much but hopefully they will help you if you come across any danger.'\n\n<rgb=#00FF00> To open the crate, use your mouse and left click on the crate twice or right click on the crate once.</rgb>
'Who, though, is your friend?'
'Amdir! There is someone here who would like to accompany you to Archet.'
'Ah, is this so? Who might this be?'
'Just a little bit more....'
'Curses, it's locked!'
'I don't know where \qBaggins\q is!'
'Maybe you should ask those hobbits that just went down the road!'
'He...he's gone.  Let's get off this road!'
'We are saved!  Thank you!'
'I'll have to try to cut through the webs.'
'The spiders won't like that much, I imagine.'
'That means you'll need to slay any of the beasts that do show up!'
Go ahead and grab your stuff
Returning from your errand, you see that Bounder Boffin has invited three hobbits to share in his fire.  The hobbits are travelling to Bree which is a curiosity in of itself.
The hobbits seem to be having a great time. The three strangers are travelling to Bree which is a bit odd for a hobbit but soon the talk of mushrooms distracts you from that worry.
Bounder Boffin thinks it is best to hide until the Black Rider passes by, and he thinks old Odo's leaf-barn could be such a place to hide.
'Frodo, why not join the fun?  We have mushrooms from just down the road!'
'Look out!  She awakes!'
Bounder Boffin has mentioned that you need a weapon before you venture deeper into the Farm.  He has brought you to a satchel with a couple weapons.
Vellob
'Fine, Frodo.  But I won't save you any mushrooms!'
Bounder Boffin has asked you to spar with him to make sure you are ready for your travels.
After proving yourself, speak to Bounder Boffin to see where he wishes to lead you.
After proving yourself, speak with Bounder Boffin to see where he wishes to lead you.
You should let Bounder Boffin know the way is now clear to the next gate.\n\nBounder Boffin asked you to clear the way to the next gate while he watched for the Black Rider's return.
With the way cleared to the next gate, follow Bounder Boffin as he opens it.
Talk to Bounder Boffin <rgb=#00FF00>(Walk forward by pressing W)</rgb>
Sit and listen to the hobbits
Follow Bounder Boffin
At the door to Odo's Farm, speak to Bounder Boffin
Take weapons from Bounder Boffin's satchel <rgb=#00FF00>(Click on the satchel using the right mouse button)</rgb>
Talk to Bounder Boffin
Spar with Bounder Boffin
Speak with Bounder Boffin
Defeat spiders ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
travel_exit (info)
'I wonder if this key will do it....'
'There, that got it!'
'Quick! This way!'
'Arm yourself before we go forward!'
'I'll keep on watch for that Rider!'
'I'm through one part of the web!'
'Keep on those spiders! I'm nearly through!'
'You two search for this \\qBaggins.\\q'
'Bah, why must this take so long!'
'I will carry your commands to Éogan!'
'Only a bit longer... I hope!'
While training to become a Bounder, your trainer, Bounder Boffin, has met three hobbit travellers along the road.  The three hobbits are travelling to Bree but have stopped to have a quick snack.
'I see you, little fools....'
'Last time, I let you live.'
'Gracious me, an Elf!'
'This one has to be it! Or not....'
'I shall not make that mistake a second time!'
'Y-y-you have my thanks, good sir Elf!'
'Honestly, I cannot say. We have not met before this night!'
'Let's be quick now!'
'You there, come tell this good elf why you were out on this lonely road tonight!'
'Not too far at all.'
'Perhaps you can tell him why you were out on this lonely road tonight!'
'Gracious, look at these webs!'
'Just a moment, I'll have this door open....'
'Well done!'
'I'm tired, Pippin.  I need to rest.  You dance for me instead.'
'Oh, Pippin.  You can have my mush... Oh my...'
'We should be leaving, Mr. Boffin.  I apologize but we must go now.'
Instance: A Road Through the Dark
'Let's go meet a bounder!'
Follow Bounder Boffin
'Where is Baggins?'
Defeat spiders ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Fool!  The Shire shall burn on the morrow!'
'Amdir!  Stand strong!  I am coming!'
Follow Bounder Boffin
'Baggins, you say?  Interesting.'
Speak to Bounder Boffin
'Bring me Baggins....'
'Take the lot with us to our camp.  Perhaps this trip is not such a waste after all.'
Follow Bounder Boffin
'Great riches shall be yours....'
'This way!'
Talk to Amdir
'Do this, and you shall be great lords of Men....'
Talk to Amdir
'Pay no heed to his forked tongue....'
'Quickly!  We must help!'
'Wait, Mr. Frodo, wait!'
'I'm glad I found you.  These Blackwolds have imprisoned too many.  We must rescue the other hobbits.  It is too late for Bounder Boffin but we must mourn later.  Hurry, follow me!'

'Ah, good, you've returned! These fine friends here were walking the road and stopped for dinner and supper and a song for the feast.\n\n'They are such cheerful folk. I wish we had more travellers around the Bounds!'
'Once I get this door open, you'll need to clear the way to the next gate. While you do that, I'll watch for that rider's return.'

Speak with Amdir, who accompanies Gildor Inglorion.\n\nUpon hearing of your task to bring a message to Celandine Brandybuck, Gildor told you that Amdir was travelling there as well and could protect you upon the road.
Speak with Bounder Boffin

'Well done.  You are a Bounder in all but ceremony.  We will take care of that when we return to Michel Delving.  Scout ahead while I lock this door and make sure the way is clear.  Return to me when you've cleared a path.

Speak with Amdir, who accompanies Gildor Inglorion.\n\nUpon hearing of your task to bring a message to Celandine Brandybuck, Gildor told you that Amdir was travelling there as well and could protect you upon the road.
Follow Bounder Boffin
'Good, you've cleared the way. There's been no sign of that Rider, but I just know he's still lurking about!\n\n'Let's dash down to the next gate. The sooner we get into Old Odo's house, the better!'

Speak with Amdir, who accompanies Gildor Inglorion.\n\nUpon hearing of your task to bring a message to Celandine Brandybuck, Gildor told you that Amdir was travelling there as well and could protect you upon the road.
Defeat spiders ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Don't just stand there...get me out of here!  I am a Sackville-Baggins!'
Speak to Bounder Boffin
'Well it is about time you saved us! Time to get out of here before more big people show up.  I'm hungry!'
Follow Bounder Boffin

'We are almost out of this spider-infested farm.  I certainly chose a poor place to hide.  I had forgotten that Odo abandoned this quite some time ago.\n\n'What do you think that rider wanted with those nice hobbits?  Oh well.. let's get going!'
'Who dares...?'
Free the other hobbits

'One last step to your training and you will be a Bounder in everything but name only. We'll have to wait until we return to Michel Delving for the proper ceremony.\n\n'Show me what you can do with those weapons of yours.'
'Your time is soon ended, Elf!'
Free yourself from the Blackwolds of Archet
'The Shadow of Mordor shall soon cover all!'
Speak with Strider
Flee the Blackwold Camp with Strider
Speak with Bounder Boffin

As Bounder Boffin tries to hack through the spider webs, defend him from the spiders that will surely try to stop him.\n\nAs you made your way into Old Odo's farm, you found your way barred by spider-webs.
Follow Bounder Boffin in search of safety.\n\nBounder Boffin found the key to Old Odo's home, but in his haste to open the door, he snapped the key off in the lock.
Speak to the imprisoned hobbit, Mundo and try to help him out of there.
'Just a bit further and we'll be safe!'
The Spider Queen has awoken.  Free Bounder Boffin and the other hobbits from the evil spider.
You find yourself imprisoned by the Blackwolds of Archet.  They have put you in their camp.  You must find a way to escape.
Now that you have been freed, follow Strider to help his fellow ranger Amdir.  They will lead you out of this evil camp!
Flee the Blackwold Camp with Strider.
Having chased away the Nazgul, speak with Mundo Sackville-Baggins.

Speak to Gildor Inglorion and tell him of your task to carry a letter to Archet.\n\nAs you followed Bounder Boffin, you came across the Black Rider giving commands to a group of Big Men. The Black Rider caught sight of you and threatened to kill you, but was stayed by the arrival of the Elf, Gildor Inglorion.

Speak with Amdir, who accompanies Gildor Inglorion.\n\nUpon hearing of your task to bring a message to Celandine Brandybuck, Gildor told you that Amdir was travelling there as well and could protect you upon the road.
'Get us out of here!'
'Free us!'
'Help!'
'Be careful, she sleeps!'
'The Blackwolds will have unimaginable power now, thanks to your Baggins!'
'Bounders are really cool.'
'They're like hobbit sherrifs!'
'Let's take a walk.'
'Good, come along. It isn't far now!'
'Bounder Boffin, come out here a moment!'
'Oh dear, there's more webs here!'
'These webs go all the way across!'
'I hope the door to the farm isn't locked!'
'I might get be able to get it open, but I'll need your help!'
travel_exit (desc)
'Weapons are good and helpful.'
'Oh my god I hate squirrels!!!!'
'I think I have the key...'
'Ah, here it is!'
'Hrm, it won't turn in the lock. I'll try harder!'
'The key... the key broke off in the lock!'
'We'll find no safety here now!'
'A Elbereth! Gilthoniel!'
'Oh no, he's seen us!'
A black rider has scared Bounder Boffin off the road!  Follow him!
'Hmm, is this one it maybe?'
<rgb=#FF0000>You did not spar well enough</rgb>
'What about this one...?'
<rgb=#00FF00>You have sparred well and impressed Bounder Boffin!</rgb>
'One more song and then we shall have supper... or is it second supper?'
'No, that's not it....'
Defeated spiders ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Either way, it will be good!'
'Is this it? No....'
Defeated spiders ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'What is the matter, Mr. Frodo?'
'How about this one?'
You've found two trapped hobbits!
'Bah, that's not it!'
You wake up inside the Blackwold compound!
'Goodness, that isn't it either!'
<rgb=#00FF00>You've escaped with the help of Strider!</rgb>
'Let me see if this is it....'
'Where did I get so many keys from?'
Otto
'To Arms!'
'Let us go.'
